entries.name: Alchemist's Supplies
entries.description: Alchemist's supplies include two glass beakers, a metal frame to hold a beaker in place over an open flame, a glass stirring rod, a small mortar and pestle, and a pouch of common alchemical ingredients, including salt, powdered iron, and purified water.

data.activities: Create alchemical items, identify substances, craft acids and alchemical fire

entries.name: Brewer's Supplies
entries.description: Brewer's supplies include a large glass jug, a quantity of hops, a siphon, and several feet of tubing.

data.activities: Brew beer and ale, detect poisoned drinks, identify brewing ingredients

entries.name: Calligrapher's Supplies
entries.description: Calligrapher's supplies include ink, a dozen sheets of parchment, and three quills.

data.activities: Create elegant writing, identify handwriting, spot forgeries

entries.name: Carpenter's Tools
entries.description: Carpenter's tools include a saw, a hammer, nails, a hatchet, a square, a ruler, an adze, a plane, and a chisel.

data.activities: Build wooden structures, repair ships, construct siege weapons

entries.name: Cartographer's Tools
entries.description: Cartographer's tools consist of a quill, ink, parchment, a pair of compasses, calipers, and a ruler.

data.activities: Create maps, determine location on a map, spot map forgeries

entries.name: Cobbler's Tools
entries.description: Cobbler's tools consist of a hammer, an awl, a knife, a shoe stand, a cutter, spare leather, and thread.

data.activities: Repair shoes and boots, determine travel distance from tracks

entries.name: Cook's Utensils
entries.description: Cook's utensils include a metal pot, knives, forks, a stirring spoon, and a ladle.

data.activities: Prepare meals, detect poisoned food, create tasty food from poor ingredients

entries.name: Glassblower's Tools
entries.description: Glassblower's tools include a blowpipe, a small marver, blocks, and tweezers. You need a source of heat to work glass.

data.activities: Create glass objects, identify glass quality, repair glass items

entries.name: Jeweler's Tools
entries.description: Jeweler's tools consist of a small saw and hammer, files, pliers, and tweezers.

data.activities: Appraise gems, identify forgeries, inscribe gemstones

entries.name: Leatherworker's Tools
entries.description: Leatherworker's tools include a knife, a small mallet, an edger, a hole punch, thread, and leather scraps.

data.activities: Repair leather armor and goods, identify leather quality

entries.name: Mason's Tools
entries.description: Mason's tools consist of a trowel, a hammer, a chisel, brushes, and a square.

data.activities: Build stone structures, identify weak points in masonry, chisel through stone walls

entries.name: Painter's Supplies
entries.description: Painter's supplies include an easel, canvas, paints, brushes, charcoal sticks, and a palette.

data.activities: Create paintings, identify paintings and their value, spot forgeries

entries.name: Potter's Tools
entries.description: Potter's tools include potter's needles, ribs, scrapers, a knife, and calipers.

data.activities: Create pottery and ceramic items, identify pottery quality and origin

entries.name: Smith's Tools
entries.description: Smith's tools include hammers, tongs, charcoal, rags, and a whetstone.

data.activities: Repair metal items and armor, create metal objects, sharpen weapons

entries.name: Tinker's Tools
entries.description: Tinker's tools include a variety of hand tools, thread, needles, a whetstone, scraps of cloth and leather, and a small pot of glue.

data.activities: Repair damaged objects, improvise temporary repairs, construct tiny clockwork devices

entries.name: Weaver's Tools
entries.description: Weaver's tools include thread, needles, and scraps of cloth. You know how to work a loom, but such equipment is too large to transport.

data.activities: Create cloth and clothing, repair fabric items, identify fabric quality

entries.name: Woodcarver's Tools
entries.description: Woodcarver's tools consist of a knife, a gouge, and a small saw.

data.activities: Create wooden figurines and objects, repair wooden items

entries.name: Dice Set
entries.description: A set of gaming dice used for various games of chance.

data.activities: Play games of chance, spot loaded dice, gamble

entries.name: Dragonchess Set
entries.description: A three-dimensional chess variant with three levels representing the sky, ground, and underground. The pieces include dragons, griffons, paladins, and more.

data.activities: Play dragonchess, predict opponent strategies, gamble on games

entries.name: Playing Card Set
entries.description: A deck of illustrated cards used for various card games.

data.activities: Play card games, perform card tricks, spot marked cards, gamble

entries.name: Three-Dragon Ante Set
entries.description: A popular fantasy card game involving dragons and gambling. The set includes a specialized deck of cards.

data.activities: Play Three-Dragon Ante, read other players, gamble

entries.name: Bagpipes
entries.description: A wind instrument with reeds and a bag, producing a distinctive droning sound.

data.activities: Perform music, entertain crowds, inspire allies

entries.name: Drum
entries.description: A percussion instrument with a membrane stretched over a frame, struck to produce rhythm.

data.activities: Perform music, provide marching rhythm, signal troops

entries.name: Dulcimer
entries.description: A stringed instrument played by striking the strings with small hammers.

data.activities: Perform music, entertain in taverns, compose melodies

entries.name: Flute
entries.description: A wind instrument played by blowing across a hole and fingering holes along its length.

data.activities: Perform music, charm animals, signal allies

entries.name: Lute
entries.description: A stringed instrument with a rounded body and a fretted neck, played by plucking.

data.activities: Perform music, accompany singing, entertain nobility

entries.name: Lyre
entries.description: A small stringed instrument with a U-shaped frame, played by plucking or strumming.

data.activities: Perform music, recite poetry with accompaniment, entertain courts

entries.name: Horn
entries.description: A brass wind instrument producing bold, resonant tones.

data.activities: Perform music, signal troops, rally allies in battle

entries.name: Pan Flute
entries.description: A wind instrument made of multiple pipes of increasing length, played by blowing across the tops.

data.activities: Perform music, charm beasts, entertain in nature settings

entries.name: Shawm
entries.description: A double-reed wind instrument with a loud, piercing tone.

data.activities: Perform music, announce ceremonies, play in outdoor events

entries.name: Viol
entries.description: A bowed stringed instrument held between the knees, producing rich, warm tones.

data.activities: Perform music, accompany ensembles, entertain refined audiences

entries.name: Disguise Kit
entries.description: This pouch of cosmetics, hair dye, and small props lets you create disguises that change your physical appearance.

data.activities: Create convincing disguises, alter appearance, impersonate others

entries.name: Forgery Kit
entries.description: This small box contains a variety of papers and parchments, pens and inks, seals and sealing wax, gold and silver leaf, and other supplies necessary to create convincing forgeries of physical documents.

data.activities: Create forged documents, duplicate seals and signatures, detect forgeries

entries.name: Herbalism Kit
entries.description: This kit contains a variety of instruments such as clippers, mortar and pestle, and pouches and vials used by herbalists to create remedies and potions.

data.activities: Identify plants, create herbal remedies, stabilize dying creatures

entries.name: Navigator's Tools
entries.description: This set of instruments is used for navigation at sea. It includes a sextant, a compass, calipers, a ruler, parchment, ink, and a quill.

data.activities: Chart courses, navigate at sea, predict weather patterns, avoid getting lost

entries.name: Poisoner's Kit
entries.description: A poisoner's kit includes the vials, chemicals, and other equipment necessary for the creation of poisons.

data.activities: Create poisons, identify poisons, apply poison safely to weapons

entries.name: Thieves' Tools
entries.description: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.

data.activities: Pick locks, disarm traps, open locked containers, disable mechanical devices

entries.name: Vehicles (Land)
entries.description: Proficiency with land vehicles covers a wide range of options, from chariots and howdahs to wagons and carts. This represents knowledge of how to drive and maintain ground-based vehicles.

data.activities: Drive carts, wagons, and chariots; perform vehicle maneuvers; maintain vehicles

entries.name: Vehicles (Water)
entries.description: Proficiency with water vehicles covers anything that navigates waterways, from rowboats and sailboats to warships. This represents knowledge of how to handle and maintain watercraft.

data.activities: Sail ships, row boats, navigate waterways, perform naval maneuvers, maintain vessels
